title: Michael B Jordan Talks About Making a Fun TV Show from a Dragon Book
summary: Michael B Jordan is helping make a TV show from the popular book Fourth Wing. The book has dragons, magic, and romance. Jordan says the show won't be silly or cheesy. He wants to pick actors carefully, mixing new people with famous ones so fans can love the characters. His company is working with Amazon on this. Jordan is also an actor and producer, and he might be in the show, but he's not sure. He talked about this at an awards event in Los Angeles. The show is based on a book series that many people around the world enjoy.

questions.question: What is the book Fourth Wing about?

background_read: Fourth Wing is a fantasy book by Rebecca Yarros that has sold millions of copies worldwide. It's part of a series called Empyrean, with dragons, magic, and love stories. Michael B Jordan is a famous actor from movies like Black Panther and Creed. He now helps produce shows and movies. This article talks about how he's making a TV show from the book, promising it will be good and not silly, so fans can enjoy it.
